abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column notes arrest of Robert A Durst on murder charges has brought peace of mind to other members of Durst real-estate empire family; younger brother Douglas, who believes Robert had been stalking him in recent months, has expressed gratitude to Andrew Jarecki and Marc Smerling, makers of HBO documentary The Jinx, despite having not cooperated with them on making of film.
lead_paragraph: Douglas Durst, the head of the Durst real-estate empire, said he believed his brother Robert had stalked him for years, including last month in Florida.

headline.main: For Durst Family, Arrest Brings a ‘Tremendous Sense of Relief’
headline.print_headline: For Durst Family, Arrest Brings a ‘Tremendous Sense of Relief’

snippet: Douglas Durst, the head of the Durst real-estate empire, said he believed his brother Robert had stalked him for years, including last month in Florida.

keywords.value: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst (TV Program)
